sections.code:
/* i really want this to be global */
* {
    font-family: "kreon Light","WenQuanYi Micro Hei" !important;
    /*font-family: "kreon Light","WenQuanYi Micro Hei" !important;*/
}

.pb, 
em, 
.enlighter div span,   
[data-hpc="true"] div, [data-hpc="true"] span, .react-blob-print-hide, 
.bash.string a, 
.xterm-rows div span, 
[ng-if="Theme.json"] span, [ng-if="Theme.json"] span s, 
.hljs-ln-line, .remark-code-line, 
.formBox div p, 
blockquote, blockquote b, blockquote p, 
.sourceLine, 
#code_JUT ol li,
pre.r a, 
pre, pre span, li span, pre.rsplus, pre b, pre span a, 
[action="/sqlcmd-sqlcourse2"] textarea,
.container div code, 
.codeMirrors, 
.ace_line span, .ace_line,  
.rsplus, 
.blob-code, .blob-code span, .blob-num, 
.r.plain, .r.functions, .r.string, .r.string a, .r.keyword, 
code.plain, code.functions, code.string, code.keyword, code.spaces, code.value, 
code span, /*stackoverflow.com*/
code span a, code date, code chr, code int, code strong, code a, 
code, kbd, samp, var {
    font-family: "Dank Mono", "WenQuanYi Micro Hei", monospace !important;
    /*Anonymous Pro*/
    font-size:100% !important;
}

.xterm-rows div span, 
.formBox div p, 
blockquote, blockquote b, blockquote p, 
.sourceLine, 
#code_JUT ol li,
pre.r a, 
pre, pre span, li span, pre.rsplus, pre b, 
/*tbody tr td span,*/ 
tbody tr td, 
.line, 
.example_code, 
.container div code, 
.codeMirrors, 
.cm-variable, 
.ace_line span, .ace_line,  
.rsplus, 
.blob-code, .blob-code span, .blob-num, 
code.r, .r.plain, .r.functions, .r.string, .r.keyword, 
code.plain, code.functions, code.string, code.keyword, code.spaces, code.value,   
code span, /*stackoverflow.com*/
code span a, 
code, kbd, samp, var {
    font-family: "Dank Mono", "WenQuanYi Micro Hei", monospace !important;
    font-size:100%;
}

.xterm-rows div span, 
.formBox div p, 
blockquote, blockquote b, blockquote p, 
.sourceLine, 
#code_JUT ol li,
pre.r a, 
pre, pre span, li span, pre.rsplus, pre b, 
/*tbody tr td span,*/ 
tbody tr td, 
.line, 
.example_code, 
.container div code, 
.codeMirrors, 
.cm-variable, 
.ace_line span, .ace_line,  
.rsplus, 
.blob-code, .blob-code span, .blob-num, 
code.r, .r.plain, .r.functions, .r.string, .r.keyword, 
code.plain, code.functions, code.string, code.keyword, code.spaces, code.value,   
code span, /*stackoverflow.com*/
code span a, 
code, kbd, samp, var {
    font-family: "Operator Mono Book", "WenQuanYi Micro Hei", monospace !important;
    font-size:100%;
}

name: Dark-GitLab Lite

usercssData.name: Dark-GitLab Lite
usercssData.description: Dark and light theme for GitLab and self-hosted GitLab instances.
usercssData.author: vednoc <vednoc@pm.me> (https://gitlab.com/vednoc)

author: vednoc <vednoc@pm.me> (https://gitlab.com/vednoc)
description: Dark and light theme for GitLab and self-hosted GitLab instances.

name: Good X/Twitter Top Nav Bar 2024 — ALL modes

usercssData.name: Good X/Twitter Top Nav Bar 2024 — ALL modes
usercssData.author: Thomas Culp
usercssData.description: Updated to work on x.com domain.    Formerly (Good Twitter) — Get a little bit of the old "good" Twitter feeling back. Combines the best parts of the old layout with the best parts of the new application. Recently added support for dark and dim modes all in one.    Moved navigation to a top bar instead of left-side column, with better notification indicators in the menu, and an overall "tighter" appearance. A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up.     06-17-2024 - Updated domain to X.com - fixed some header/nav issues.

author: Thomas Culp
description: Updated to work on x.com domain.    Formerly (Good Twitter) — Get a little bit of the old "good" Twitter feeling back. Combines the best parts of the old layout with the best parts of the new application. Recently added support for dark and dim modes all in one.    Moved navigation to a top bar instead of left-side column, with better notification indicators in the menu, and an overall "tighter" appearance. A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up.     06-17-2024 - Updated domain to X.com - fixed some header/nav issues.

name: Old New Twitter

usercssData.name: Old New Twitter
usercssData.author: Tritium Decay
usercssData.description: This theme tries to make the new Twitter design look less different from its previous design.The top bar is brought back and colors of things are made to match the older twitter. There is support for all default colour schemes. If you like it, please leave a positive rating. Contact me on My Twitter if you wish to suggest a change. Screenshots Dark Mode Profile Backgrounds Light Mode Lights Out Mode -Basically all languages are supported
